channel.title: Summon NPC when touching an object
channel.description: I tried to put a thing like that on my own server, so basically when I touch a crate a few npc's appear and you can attack them. Tried summonNewNpc didn't work, I guess I did it wrong. Anyone who has an idea about this help me. :P

item.title: Summon NPC when touching an object
item.dc:creator: @Aurimux_ra Aurimux ra
item.description:
@Aurimux_ra wrote:

try this (this is not by me, this is from barrows tut)

public void spawnABrother(int npcID, int absX, int absY) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), heightLevel, absX + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false); }

then put like this :

					spawnABrother(2026,3553,9715);

i hope this helps n_n

Read full topic
item.source: Summon NPC when touching an object
